amendment.description: After section 11201, insert the following (and make such conforming changes as may be necessary): SEC. XXX. STATE BEGINNING FARMER AND RANCHER COORDINATOR. Section 226 of the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 6934) is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection: ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 115-679 to direct the Secretary to designate, among existing USDA staff, a Beginning Farmer and Rancher (BFR) Coordinator in each state, without associated cost.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Costello (PA) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Costello (PA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Costello (PA) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
